description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the windows image acquisition elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38022), it is essential to apply the relevant updates as described below:

1. Download and apply the KB5040442 update for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2 from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. For Windows 10 users, ensure KB5040448 is installed for both 32-bit and x64-based systems.
3. If you are on Windows 10 Version 21H2, install KB5040431 as applicable.
4. Restart your system after the installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves an elevation of privilege vulnerability caused by improper link resolution before file access.
- You can find the updates at the following links:
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a version compatible with the above KB articles.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
